mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{actorId}, title = #{title}, `body`= #{body}, boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}

SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, COUNT(RP.id) AS extra__replyCount FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id LEFT JOIN reply AS RP ON A.id = RP.relId AND RP.relTypeCode = 'article' WHERE 1
AND A.boardId = #{boardId}
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
GROUP BY A.id ORDER BY A.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart}, #{limitTake}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article AS A WHERE boardId = #{boardId}
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
SELECT hitCount FROM article WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT goodReactionPoint FROM article WHERE id = #{relId}
SELECT badReactionPoint FROM article WHERE id = #{relId}

SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer , COUNT(RP.id) AS extra__replyCount FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id INNER JOIN reply AS RP ON A.id = RP.relId AND RP.relTypeCode = 'article' WHERE A.boardId = #{boardId} AND A.goodReactionPoint > 0 GROUP BY A.id ORDER BY A.goodReactionPoint DESC LIMIT 0,3
